name: Afterlight (itch) (Duncan Sparks, Rami, johantan, dsaname, nuclearMonkey)
name_original: Afterlight (itch) (Duncan Sparks, Rami, johantan, dsaname, nuclearMonkey)
description:
Oliver O’Felix has a near-death experience and stands on the precipice of dying. He finds himself in the Underworld, but a magical torch representing his loved ones’ hope that he can survive falls down with him. He must find his way out of the Underworld before it’s too late, but the denizens of the Underworld aren’t too keen on letting that happen.

You have only one light.

Made for the Game Maker's Toolkit Jam 2019.

Developed by:

  • Rami Shreim - Design, Environment Art
  • Riley Park - Writing, Design
  • Duncan Sparks - Programming, Writing
  • Johan Tan - Programming, Audio
  • Lyndon de la Torre - Programming, Design
  • Hunter Abaravich - Character Art
